title: nanda nandana
sahitya:
nanda nandana pAhi guNa brnda sundara rUpa gOvinda mukunda


caraNam 1    pavanaja parivAra yamunA vihAra navaratna hAra navanIta cOra
    caraNam 2    dinakaradyuti jAla kanakamaya cEla janakAnukUla janakajA lOla
    caraNam 3    tunga vihanga turanga dayApAnga rangaviTTala bhavabhanga shubhAnga
